```{r setup}
library(ussie)
library(dplyr)
```

ussie let's you work with euoropean football data from the engsoccerdata package by making standard tibbles for each league



```{r matches_italy}
matches_italy <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::italy, "Italy")
glimpse(matches_italy)
```
